|cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = MIPS |cpu1_type_rev = |cpu1spd = 400 |is_doc = |bus = |flash1type = |fla1_num = |fla1chip = Macronix;MX30LF1G08AA-TI; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = |ram1type = |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = EtronTech;EM68816CWQD-25H; |ram1_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |dsl_ports = |voip_ports = |wan_ports = |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = |oui = |bootwait = |stockbootloader = |stockos = |exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = VDSL2, ADSL2+ |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = bgn |defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = root |defaultpass = 12345 |defaultssid = Comtrend_XXXX |defaultssid_regex = ^Comtrend_[A-F0-9]{4}$ |default_ch = |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 11/04/2013 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = |rad1cap = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "50XX13-182" and a date code of '''1214''' (April 2012) is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. Default settings are per the FCC manual - they may be inaccurate. :Additionally, other accounts are specified... :*User access: user:user :*Remote (WAN) access: support:support The power adapter shown in the FCC photos is an '''Amigo''' :AMS9-1201000FU2 (100-240VAC ~ 50/60Hz, 0.5A -> 12VDC, 1.0A). *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/comtrend/vr3032u ''Comtrend VR-3032u'' on '''OpenWRT Wiki'''] 
System-On-Chip:	Broadcom BCM63168 SoC
CPU/Speed:	BMIPS4350 v8.0 / 400 MHz
NAND:	128 MiB (MX30LF1G08AA-TI)
RAM:	64 MiB / DDR2 (EM68816CWQD-25H)
Wireless:	BCM6362 802.11bgn (SoC)
Ethernet:	Integrated BCM63168
USB:		Yes
Power adapter:	12V DC 1A / UP0121B-12PE
[[Category:English Documentation]]
